Grizzly bears are a type of bear found in the forests of Gielinor. Although relatively weak, they could be very dangerous to a low-level player. They can be given as a Slayer assignment. Its pelt must be collected and cleaned for the Odd Old Man during the Fur 'n Seek quest.

The most populous area of grizzly bears is at the Legends' Guild south-west mine, east of Manor Farm.

Update history[edit | edit source]

This information has been compiled as part of the update history project. Some updates may not be included – see here for how to help out!
  • patch 5 February 2024 (Update):
    • Grizzly Bears and Black Bears no longer appear purple when textures are disabled.
  • patch 22 January 2024 (Update):
    • Black bears and grizzly bears, including their cubs, have been graphically updated.
  • hidden 7 August 2023 (Update):
    • Grizzly bears' weakness was changed from air spells to water spells.
  • patch 7 June 2021 (Update):
    • Grizzly bear death animations have been fixed.
  • ninja 26 October 2020 (Update):
    • Monsters with multiple variants will now consistently spawn as those variants when newly placed in the Personal Slayer Dungeon.
      • This includes bears.
  • patch 21 August 2012 (Update):
    • Bears have animations again.
  • update 20 September 2004 (Update):
    • New level variant of grizzly bears added to game.
  • update 4 January 2001 (Update):
    • Added to game.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ a b Jagex. Thomas Karlsson (Mod NicePants)'s Twitter account. 9 November 2018. (Archived from the original on 9 November 2018.) Thomas Karlsson (Mod NicePants): "Happy Friday everyone! Here's a creature update for #RuneScape that I worked on recently, along with Björn, the pet companion! Ingame models by @JagexSparky <3"
  2. ^ a b c d e Isaac Pringle (Mod Sparky). Grizzly Bear - Runescape. ArtStation. 9 November 2018. (Archived from the original on 5 June 2021.) "Hey! Here is one of the more recent models I have made for Runescape, part of a rework to the grizzy bears! - All sculpting/modelling/texturing was done by myself. - Pose and animation done by Chris Winstone - Concept by Thomas Karlsson - © Owned by Jagex 2018 - https://www.runescape.com/"
  3. ^ Jagex. Mod Sparky's Twitter account. 9 November 2018. (Archived from the original on 9 November 2018.) Mod Sparky: "Hey everyone! Posted up some of the final images for the bear, Björn, I made recently. https://www.artstation.com/artwork/XBnYGy"
